Package play

Game classes are used to interact with the player.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Class representing the game board A game board is defined by those informations : number of squares : beginning square : ordered list of square : A game board can have actions such as : set a square in the ordered list of square
    ConnectionToDB
    Class representing the saved data.
    Dice
    Class representing dice for the game A dice is defined by those informations : number of sides : first side value : A dice can have actions such as : throw dice : throw trick dice :
    Game  
    Menu
    Class representing the menu of the game A menu is defined by those informations : keyboard : game : A menu can have actions such as : create perso : getPersoListChoices : create warrior : create wizard: update perso : menu choices : end game :

Package play Description

Game classes are used to interact with the player. These classes contain all the informations and processing tasks regarding game rules and interactions with the player.
Version:
1.0
